logical_flow: The narrative begins with an overview of the dataset, introducing key elements such as conferences, paper types, and citation impact. It then delves into distribution analysis to understand the spread of key metrics. Temporal trends are explored to identify changes over time, followed by relationship analysis to uncover correlations between variables. The paper concludes with advanced insights, highlighting top papers and synthesizing findings across multiple dimensions.
flow_justification: This order creates a compelling story by starting with foundational insights and progressively building towards more complex analyses. Each stage logically follows from the previous one, ensuring a coherent narrative that guides the reader through the dataset's key insights and conclusions.
